item.title: Introducing 0xAssistant: an LLM‑powered WinDbg assistant for Windows
item.description: 0xAssistant is a Windows‑native app that layers an LLM atop WinDbg/CDB to explain output, suggest next steps, and speed up crash dump analysis—no Python or extra tooling required.
